title: Understanding Data Tables
text: A data table in Excel is a tool used for what-if analysis. It helps in analyzing how changes in one or more variables affect the outcome of a formula.

title: Purpose of Data Tables
text: Data tables are particularly useful when you want to see the effects of different input values on a particular formula or set of formulas.

hintAnswer: It automates data analyses and organizes the results returned by Excel
title: Functionality of Data Tables
text: What is the primary function of a data table in Excel?
choices: It automates data analyses and organizes the results returned by Excel
it shows the data in visualizations
it causes data to be better organized
